sense.def:
An object
je vse, kar ima stalno obliko in ni živo.

seg.quote: ...the shabby, black object he was carrying.

sense.def:
One's object
ali
the object of what one is doing
je cilj ali namen tistega, kar nekdo dela.

seg.quote: The minder's object is to keep the child asleep.
She would journey for months with the sole object of filming a rare creature.

sense.def:
The object of a feeling, a wish, or a kind of behaviour
je tista stvar ali oseba, na katero se nanaša čustvo, želja ali vedenje.

seg.quote: She became an object of worship.

sense.def:
V slovnici je
the object
tista samostalniška besedna zveza, ki izraža osebo ali stvar, na katero vpliva dejanje, izraženo z glagolom.
An indirect object
je drugi predmet ob glagolih, kot je
give
(dati), in izraža osebo ali stvar, ki ji je dejanje namenjeno. Tudi predlogi imajo svoje predmete.

To object to something
pomeni, da nečesa ne odobravamo ali da rečemo, da nečesa ne odobravamo.

seg.quote: This was exactly what he objected to in Christine.
You may object that the system makes boys effeminate.
The men objected and the women supported them.
